title: Canyon Neuron CF gives versatile 130mm trail bike travel boost, geometry tweak for bigger adventure
content:
Canyon’s carbon Neuron CF all-rounder trail bike adds an extra 10mm of fork travel for 2022, boosting its technical trail capabilities while retaining pedaling efficiency.
